name: europeana
title: Europeana
description: [Europeana Collections](https://www.europeana.eu/ "Europeana Collections") provides access to over 50 million digitised items – books, music, artworks and more – with sophisticated search and filter tools to help you find what you’re looking for. Our dedicated thematic collections on art, fashion, music, photography and World War I contain galleries, blogs and exhibitions to inform and inspire.
